description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Drizzle is a Frantic, Fun Puzzle Game. The player must try to collect different coloured acid rain, using different coloured buckets. The overall aim is growing trees to restore the planet to a lush environment. Harvey the robot and his friends will help you along the way, but the hard work is really up to you!
description.short: Drizzle is a Frantic, Fun Puzzle Game. The player must try to collect different coloured acid rain, using different coloured buckets. The overall aim is growing trees to restore the planet to a lush environment. Harvey the robot and his friends will help you along the way, but the hard work is really up to you!
